subject: [R] Generalizability Theory
body:
Hi friends out there, any chance any of you knows how to run Generalizability Theory stats using R packages? Any help will greatly appreciated (especially if anyone has any examples)

jason
 
Dr. Iasonas Lamprianou
Department of Education

Oxford Road, Manchester M13 9PL, UK

PLEASE do read the posting guide http://www.R-project.org/posting-guide.html
and provide commented, minimal, self-contained, reproducible code.
